constraints.name: swap_condition
constraints.description: 只有当至少一个元素是幸运数时，才能交换两个元素
constraints.formal: For any swap (i, j), at least one of a[i] or a[j] must be a lucky number

constraints.name: operation_limit
constraints.description: 操作次数不超过 2n 次

constraints.name: ordering
constraints.description: 数组必须按非递减顺序排列
